SEARCH
Package control

Class InternshipManager

java.lang.Object
control.InternshipManager
public class InternshipManager extends Object
Internship Manager - Handles internship-related operations

Responsibilities:

  • Create, update, and delete internships
  • Approve or reject internships for visibility to students
  • Filter internships for students or career center staff
  • Provide internship statistics

    • createInternship

      public InternshipOpportunity createInternship(String title, String description, InternshipLevel level, Major preferredMajor, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, String companyRepresentativeID, int totalSlots, int filledSlots)
      Create a new internship opportunity
      Parameters:
      title - internship title
      description - internship description
      level - internship level
      preferredMajor - preferred major
      openingDate - opening date
      closingDate - closing date
      companyRepresentativeID - representative creating the internship
      totalSlots - total number of slots
      filledSlots - total number of filled slots
      Returns:
      created internship or null if creation failed

    • getVisibleInternships

      public List<InternshipOpportunity> getVisibleInternships(Student student, InternshipStatus statusFilter, Major majorFilter, InternshipLevel levelFilter)
      Get internships visible to students based on filters
      Parameters:
      student - student viewing the internships
      statusFilter - status filter (null for no filter)
      majorFilter - major filter (null for no filter)
      levelFilter - level filter (null for no filter)
      Returns:
      filtered list of internships

    • getVisibleInternshipsWithFilters

      public List<InternshipOpportunity> getVisibleInternshipsWithFilters(Student student, InternshipFilterSettings filterSettings)
      Get internships visible to students with comprehensive filter settings Students can see internships they applied for even if visibility is off
      Parameters:
      student - student viewing the internships
      filterSettings - filter settings to apply
      Returns:
      filtered list of internships

      public boolean updateInternship(String internshipID, String title, String description, InternshipLevel level, Major preferredMajor, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, int totalSlots)
      Update internship details (before approval)
      Parameters:
      internshipID - internship ID
      title - new title
      description - new description
      level - new level
      preferredMajor - new preferred major
      openingDate - new opening date
      closingDate - new closing date
      totalSlots - new total slots
      Returns:
      true if updated successfully
